title: Nicola Sturgeon on shyness being her ‘secret superpower’
content: This video can not be playedNicola Sturgeon has spoken out about her experience of being an introvert in the world of politics.Talking to the BBC’s Nicola Sturgeon Podcast <https://www.bbc.co.uk/sounds/brand/p0fbg2m8>, Scotland’s former first minister said that she has always been “painfully shy” and carries a “fairly healthy dose of self-doubt”.But she added that this character trait became her “secret superpower”.Hear more of the conversation by subscribing to the Nicola Sturgeon podcast on BBC Sounds - Episode 2,Nicola Sturgeon - The Person is available now <https://www.bbc.co.uk/sounds/play/p0fdbj78>.
